title: Rome
description: Explore the Eternal City: Rome! Welcome to the heart of history, art, and culture. Discover the magic of Rome as we journey through its iconic landmarks, ancient treasures, and culinary delights.

services.title: Transportation
services.intro: In the bustling streets of Rome, where history meets modernity, walking reigns as the best mode of transportation. Strolling through this ancient city allows you to uncover hidden gems tucked away in narrow alleys, witness the grandeur of historic landmarks at your own pace, and savor the scents and sounds of local life. Altough if you aren't big on walking, taxis are very easy to find.

services.title: Vatican City
services.intro: The Vatican, also known as Vatican City, is the world's smallest independent state and the spiritual center of the Roman Catholic Church. Enclaved within Rome, Italy, it is home to St. Peter's Basilica, the Vatican Museums, and the residence of the Pope. The Vatican is a place of immense religious and historical significance, attracting millions of visitors each year.
